item.title: DASH
item.description: score:114 Chances: The new law regarding the gig economy from the Biden administration may have a significant impact on companies like DoorDash (DASH). The upgrade of DoorDash (DASH) to ‘Buy’ from ‘Hold’ by Jefferies indicates positive sentiment towards the company’s future performance. The early release of the new Golden Carolina BBQ Tenders by Cracker Barrel Old Country StoreÂ® for DoorDash members presents an opportunity to attract more customers.
